item.title: Mentioned by CBC.ca
item.description:
Liberal MP excited about Justin Trudeau's leadership
New Brunswick's lone Liberal MP is confident the party will do better here under the new federal leadership of Justin Trudeau. Beausejour's Dominic LeBlanc says there was tremendous support for Trudeau when he visited the province while campaigning.
